alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 20 at 3:57AM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
